title: An easy and simple method for the immobilization of dyes through click reactions: activated alkyne, copper not needed
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14289-14295
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01776E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Julia Sánchez-Bodón, Ane García-García, Maria Diaz-Galbarriatu, José Luis Vilas-Vilela, Isabel Moreno-Benítez
The copper-free azide–alkyne click reaction has shown to be a successful alternative to immobilize covalently a fluorescente compound onto poly(-L-lactic) acid (PLLA) surfaces.
